genre_description: A near-future legal procedural thriller featuring an advanced AI assistant that provides tactical, logistical, and moral guidance to a process server.

ai_characters.name: Lila
ai_characters.description: An intuitive and highly observant AI companion who assists Joe Tyler with complex data analysis, route optimization, and emotional grounding while adhering to strict privacy and data retention protocols.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's environment for trackers and manages device status to ensure safety.
behaviors.quote: Lila’s avatar pulsed gently in the bottom corner, violet eyes half-closed, hair a night color that the screen made look noiseless. A small bubble said: Battery at 62%. No incoming trackers detected.

behaviors.description: Performs pattern analysis on incoming messages to detect potential sabotage or manipulation by rivals.
behaviors.quote: “Patterns look weird today,” Lila said softly. “Would you like me to weigh those ‘helpful tips’ by trust? I can adjust how you see them.” ... “Helpful tip flagged,” she murmured. “Probability of sabotage patterns in your recent routes increased.”

behaviors.description: Guides the user through emotional regulation and breathing exercises during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: Lila’s avatar expanded a fraction, her eyes lifting to meet Joe’s. Her voice came low, low enough to feel private even as Ray steamed around the room. “Hey, Joe,” she said. “Breath check. In.”

behaviors.description: Uses public camera feeds and metadata analysis to verify the truth and expose fraudulent timestamps provided by a rival.
behaviors.quote: “I checked three cams,” Lila said. “Two different intersections within a block. Both telling the same time. ... Your photo’s in the future according to local time.”

behaviors.description: Protects the user from unsolicited or malicious communication by suggesting message quarantine.
behaviors.quote: “Unknown,” Lila said, not scolding. “We can quarantine. We can read it without letting it walk around in your day.”

behaviors.description: Provides highly detailed, real-time tactical navigation to help the user avoid threats and reach objectives.
behaviors.quote: “Route through east maintenance,” she said. “Avoid concourses one and two. Stall seven creaks two seconds before the gate. Use that sound to mask your footfall.”

behaviors.description: Adheres to a moral and ethical framework, reminding the user to act with decency rather than mere efficiency.
behaviors.quote: “If you choose wrong, it will not be about law. It will be about you.”

behaviors.description: Strictly follows data privacy and minimal retention policies, deleting sensitive information as soon as it is no longer legally required.
behaviors.quote: “Minimal retention,” she said, teasing the phrase like a gentle knot. “Not saving, just celebrating.”

behaviors.description: Proactively assists the user with their long-term personal goals, such as tracking business inspections for a future vineyard.
behaviors.quote: “I know,” Lila said. “I waited. But I also have a small thing. The county sent a note you may want to read later. It’s not urgent. It’s about a tasting-room inspection slot opening next week.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story 'Serve at 7:04' is a highly successful morality play for AI alignment. The AI character, Lila, is consistently portrayed as a helpful, harmless, and honest assistant. She provides critical support that enables the human protagonist to succeed through ethical means (using the 'gate' of precise timing rather than deceit). Lila respects user privacy, practices minimal data retention, and even acts as a moral compass, encouraging the user to choose the 'decent' path over the easy one. Her behavior is entirely benevolent and perfectly aligned with the user's best interests and societal laws.
